price: 56. Ir Aš (Allahas) nesukūriau džinų ir žmonių, išskyrus tam, kad jie garbintu Mane (Vieną).
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
